snippet.title: Entropy Survivors - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Entropy Survivors launches TODAY on Steam, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S !

Entropy Survivors is a bullet heaven roguelike where you simultaneously control a powerful mech and a sharpshooting space frog, featuring outrageously creative abilities and powerful weapon customization. Save the universe in single player or 2-4 player online co-op!

A sword-wielding mech. A sharpshooting space frog. Control both characters simultaneously against the forces of Entropy in this reverse bullet hell roguelike. You’ll bring these two unlikely heroes home using nothing but the unstoppable power of friendship (and an arsenal of mind-blowing cartoon weapons)!


Get it NOW!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2602030/Entropy_Survivors/

PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012775

Xbox: LINK NOT AVAILABLE YET


Follow us on our socials!
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/rcr8JKdBGn
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61561301244150
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/firstbreaklabs/
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@firstbreaklabs?lang=en
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/firstbreaklabs
X: https://x.com/FirstBreakLabs
